# isActive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the feedback’s action is on or off.

## Declaration

```swift
var isActive: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], feedback is available. Use this property to get or set the current state of the given feedback. An example of an active feedback command is a Like button that has been enabled by the user. In that scenario, toggling the button on and off would similarly toggle the value in this property.

## Retrieving information about a feedback command

- **localizedTitle**: A localized string used to describe the context of a command.
- **localizedShortTitle**: A shortened version of the string used to describe the context of a command.
